column1: 22829942$Fusion Recycling Plant$Unlimited$SPELL$$$$$$$$$Field$$$Once per turn: You can discard 1 card; add 1 "Polymerization" from your Deck or GY to your hand. Once per turn
column2: during the End Phase: You can target 1 monster in your GY that was used as Fusion Material for a Fusion Summon this turn; add it to your hand.$Polymerization/Fusion Material$$Discards for cost/Adds from Deck to hand/Adds from Graveyard to hand$Ignition-like/Trigger-like$
